item.title: Climate change and food
item.description: In part three of our series on climate change and health we examine how environmental changes will affect not only the food we can grow, but how they will make what we’re already growing less nutritious. https://soundcloud.com/harvardpublichealth/march-2-2017-climate-change-and-food?in=harvardpublichealth/sets/harvard-chan-this-week-in
